attributes.action: Remove the TV licence fee requirement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my view , people who do not wish to watch BBC are forced to PAY  because all TV sets have the inbuilt capability to receive their transmissions.  This can apply currently to video recorders and even computers. This is totally unfair and imposes upon ones rights to watch other TV Channels, unharrased by the BBC Detector Vans. Ban the TV licence, and give us our freedom back...Please sign up if you wish to be free in this Land.
